name: PICA ZERO
description:
You can't keep running forever...

PLAY THE FIRST GAME IN THE PICO ZERO SERIES

PICA ZERO is psychological horror game taking place in the same world as the original. Play as PICA, a pink rabbit who is waiting for some very important news... Solve puzzles, explore, and make sure HE doesn't find you.

Both PICO ZERO and PICA ZERO are small prototype projects, if you would like to see PICO ZERO more fully developed and expanded, consider sharing the game and leaving a good review.  - Stick Figya

PICA ZERO Original Soundtrack
